  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      protected Enemy(String resource, com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D initialPosition, double speed, int damage, int health)
      Super class for all enemy types, abstracting away the moveement and the implementation of a livingEntity
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource file that is used for the SpriteEntity
      initialPosition - The initial position of the Enemy
      speed - The speed with which the enemy moves in the LEFT direction
      damage - Amount of damage the enemy does to the barricade
      health - Amount of health the enemy has
